venue.name: Christ Church United, UCC, in Lowell

item.description:
What better way to experience the holidays than through great music?

Synergy Brass Quintet (http://www.synergybra...) will be performing a holiday concert at Christ Church United, UCC, in Lowell (http://www.WeWelcomeA...) at 7pm on Wed. 12/22/10.

All are welcome to enjoy the music, sing along, get in the holiday spirit and learn a little more about All Souls House (http://www.AllsoulsHo...) - CCU's effort to create permanent housing for homeless families.

Tickets are $12 per person and children under 12 will be admitted free. Anyone who does not have the means to purchase a ticket should feel free to come anyway.
item.name: Holiday Concert - Progressive Christians of Greater Lowell
